amendment.description: To promote recruitment of former members of the Armed Forces and members of the reserve components of the Armed Forces to serve in United States Customs and Border Protection and United States Immigration and Customs Enforcement.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1298 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1298 proposed by Senator Leahy for Senator Pryor.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1298 proposed by Senator Leahy for Senator Pryor.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1298 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
